461:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ imamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato'ntikāt saṃmukhamāyuṣmataśca śāriputrasya vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptā stasyāṃ velāyāmutthāyāsanebhyo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāman|
461:2: upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantamabhimukhamullokayamānā avanakāyā abhinatakāyāḥ praṇatakāyāstasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocan-vayaṃ hi bhagavan jīrṇā vṛddhā mahallakā asmin bhikṣusaṃghe sthavirasaṃmatā jarājīrṇībhūtā nirvāṇaprāptāḥ sma iti bhagavan nirudyamā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvapratibalāḥ smaḥ,
461:6: vayaṃ ca tasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ pratyupasthitā bhavāmaḥ,
461:7: tadāpyasmākaṃ bhagavan ciraṃ niṣaṇṇānāṃ bhagavantaṃ ciraṃ paryupāsitānāmaṅgapratyaṅgāni duḥkhanti,
461:9: tato vayaṃ bhagavan bhagavato dharmaṃ deśayamānasya śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ sarvamāviṣkurmaḥ|
461:10: nāsmābhireṣu buddhadharmeṣu buddhakṣetravyūheṣu vā bodhisattvavikrīḍiteṣu vā tathāgatavikrīḍiteṣu vā spṛhotpāditā|
461:14: tato bhagavan asmābhirapyanye bodhisattvā avavaditā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
461:17: te vayaṃ bhagavannetarhi bhagavato'ntikācchrāvakāṇāmapi vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhavatīti śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāptā mahālābhaprāptāḥ smaḥ|
461:18: bhagavannadya sahasaivemamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ tathāgataghoṣaṃ śrutvā mahāratnapratilabdhāśca smaḥ|
461:20: bhagavan amārgitamaparyeṣṭamacintitamaprārthitaṃ cāsmābhirbhagavannidamevaṃ rūpaṃ mahāratnaṃ pratilabdham|
461:23: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ piturantikādapakrāmet|
461:25: sa tatra bahūni varṣāṇi vipravased viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā|
461:26: atha sa bhagavan mahān puruṣo bhavet|
461:28: sa ca vṛttiṃ paryeṣamāṇa āhāracīvarahetordiśo vidiśaḥ prakāman anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ gacchet|
461:29: tasya ca sa pitā anyatamaṃ janapadaṃ prakrāntaḥ syāt|
461:37: athe khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣa āhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetorgrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu paryaṭamāno'nupūrveṇa yatrāsau puruṣo bahudhanahiraṇyasuvarṇakośakoṣṭhāgārastasyaiva pitā vasati,
461:39: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣasya pitā bahudhanahiraṇyakośakoṣṭhāgārastasmin nagare vasamānastaṃ pañcāśadvarṣanaṣṭaṃ putraṃ satatasamitamanusmaret|
461:41: evaṃ ca cintayet-ahamasmi jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ|
461:46: sa taṃ punaḥ punaḥ putramanusmaret-aho nāmāhaṃ nirvṛtiprāpto bhaveyaṃ yadi me sa putra imaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ paribhuñjīta||
461:47: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣa āhāracīvaraṃ paryeṣamāṇo'nupūrveṇa yena tasya prabhūtahiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasya samṛddhasya puruṣasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmet|
461:48: atha khalu bhagavan sa tasya daridrapuruṣasya pitā svake niveśanadvāre mahatyā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrapariṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto mahāsiṃhāsane sapādapīṭhe suvarṇarūpyapratimaṇḍite upaviṣṭo hiraṇyakoṭīśatasahasrairvyavahāraṃ kurvan vālavyajanena vījyamāno vitatavitāne pṛthivīpradeśe muktakusumābhikīrṇe ratnadāmābhipralambite mahatyaddharyā upaviṣṭaḥ syāt|
461:49: adrākṣīt sa bhagavan daridrapuruṣastaṃ svakaṃ pitaraṃ svake niveśanadvāre evaṃrūpayā ṛdhyā upaviṣṭaṃ mahatā janakāyena parivṛtaṃ gṛhapatikṛtyaṃ kurvāṇam|
461:50: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvignamānasaḥ evamanuvicintayāmāsa-sahasaivāyaṃ mayā rājā vā rājamātro vā āsāditaḥ|
461:57: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo duḥkhaparaṃparāmanasikārabhayabhītastvaramāṇaḥ prakrāmet palāyet,
461:59: atha khalu bhagavan sa āḍhyaḥ puruṣaḥ svake niveśanadvāre siṃhāsane upaviṣṭastaṃ svakaṃ putraṃ sahadarśanenaiva pratyabhijānīyāt|
461:60: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavet,
461:61: evaṃ ca cintayet-āścaryaṃ yāvad yatra hi nāma asya mahato hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasya paribhoktā upalabdhaḥ|
461:65: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ putratṛṣṇāsaṃpīḍitastasmin kṣaṇalavamuhūrte javanān puruṣān saṃpreṣayet-gacchata mārṣā etaṃ puruṣaṃ śīghramānayadhvam|
461:66: atha khalu bhagavaṃste puruṣāḥ rsava eva javena pradhāvitāstaṃ daridrapuruṣamadhyālambeyuḥ|
461:67: atha khalu daridrapuruṣastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvigramānaso dāruṇamārtasvaraṃ muñcedāraved viravet|
461:69: atha khalu te puruṣā balātkāreṇa taṃ daridrapuruṣaṃ viravantamapyākarṣeyuḥ|
461:70: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣo bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna udvignamānasa evaṃ ca cintayet-mā tāvadahaṃ vadhyo daṇḍayo bhaveyam|
461:75: sa tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet-mā bhavanta etaṃ puruṣamānayantviti|
461:76: tamenaṃ śītalena vāriṇā parisiñcitvā na bhūya ālapet|
461:80: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatirupāyakauśalyena na kasyacidācakṣet-mamaiṣa putra iti|
461:81: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatiranyataraṃ puruṣamāmantrayet-gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa|
461:82: enaṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadasva-gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi|
461:84: evaṃ vadati sa puruṣastasmai pratiśrutya yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet|
461:85: upasaṃkramya taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet-gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi|
461:87: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣa idaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet|
461:88: sa utthāya tasmāt pṛthivīpradeśādyena daridravīthī tenopasaṃkrāmedāhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ|
461:90: sa tatra dvau puruṣau prayojayet durvarṇāvalpaujaskau-gacchatāṃ bhavantau yo'sau puruṣa ihāgato'bhūt,
461:91: taṃ yuvāṃ dviguṇayā divasamudrayā ātmavacanenaiva bharayitveha mama niveśane karma kārāpayethām|
461:92: sacet sa evaṃ vadet-kiṃ karma kartavyamiti,
461:94: atha tau puruṣau taṃ daridrapuruṣaṃ paryeṣayitvā tayā kriyayā saṃpādayetām|
461:95: atha khalu tau dvau puruṣau sa ca daridrapuruṣo vetanaṃ gṛhītvā tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasyāntikāttasminneva niveśane saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayeyuḥ|
461:96: tasyaiva ca mahādhanasya puruṣasya gṛhaparisare kaṭapalikuñcikāyāṃ vāsaṃ kalpayeyuḥ|
461:97: sa cāḍhyaḥ puruṣo gavākṣavātāyanena taṃ svakaṃ putraṃ paśyet saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayamānam|
461:99: atha khalu sa gṛhapatiḥ svakānniveśanādavatīrya apanayitvā mālyābharaṇani,
461:102: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā piṭakaṃ parigṛhya pāṃsunā svagātraṃ dūṣayitvā dūrata eva saṃbhāṣamāṇo yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet|
461:107: enaṃ vadet-ihaiva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa karma kuruṣva|
461:110: yena yena ca te kārya bhavet,
461:112: yadi vā kuṇḍamūlyena yadi vā kuṇḍikāmūlyena yadi vā sthālikāmūlyena yadi vā kāṣṭhamūlyena yadi vā lavaṇamūlyena yadi vā bhojanena yadi vā prāvaraṇena|
461:117: yena yena te bhoḥ puruṣa kāryamevaṃrūpeṇa pariṣkāreṇa,
461:125: mama ca tvayā bahu karma kṛtamimaṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayatā|
461:126: na ca tvayā bhoḥ puruṣa atra karma kurvatā śāṭhayaṃ vā vakratā vā kauṭilyaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā kṛtapūrvaḥ, karoṣi vā|
461:127: sarvathā te bhoḥ puruṣa na samanupaśyāmyekamapi pāpakarma,
461:128: yathaiṣāmanyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karma kurvatāmime doṣāḥ saṃvidyante|
461:131: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya putra iti nāma kuryāt|
461:133: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa sa gṛhapatiḥ putrakāmatṛṣito viṃśativarṣāṇi taṃ putraṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhāpayet|
461:134: atha viṃśatervarṣāṇāmatyayena sa daridrapuruṣastasya gṛhapaterniveśane viśrabdho bhavenniṣkramaṇapraveśe,
461:136: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya gṛhapaterglānyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavet|
461:137: sa maraṇakālasamayaṃ ca ātmanaḥ pratyupasthitaṃ samanupaśyet|
461:138: sa taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet-āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa|
461:141: icchāmyetaṃ yasya dātavyaṃ yataśca grahītavyaṃ yacca nidhātavyaṃ bhavet,
461:146: mā ca me tvaṃ kiṃcidato vipraṇāśayiṣyasi||
461:147: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo'nena paryāyeṇa tacca tasya gṛhapateḥ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ saṃjānīyāt|
461:153: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistaṃ putraṃ śaktaṃ paripālakaṃ paripakvaṃ viditvā avamarditacittamudārasaṃjñayā ca paurvikayā daridracintayā ārtīyantaṃ jehrīyamāṇaṃ jugupsamānaṃ viditvā maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite taṃ daridrapuruṣamānāyya mahato jñātisaṃghasyopanāmayitvā rājño vā rājamātrasya vā purato naigamajānapadānāṃ ca saṃmukhamevaṃ saṃśrāvayet-śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ,
461:154: ayaṃ mama putra auraso mayaiva janitaḥ|
461:166: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣastasmin samaye imamevaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet|
461:167: evaṃ ca vicintayet-sahasaiva mayedameva tāvad hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ pratilabdhamiti||
461:175: tato vayaṃ bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāradhānasadṛśānanuvicintayitāḥ|
461:177: nirvāṇamātraṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan divasamudrāmiva paryeṣamāṇā mārgāmaḥ|
461:178: tena ca vayaṃ bhagavan nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭā bhavāmaḥ|
461:179: bahu ca labdhamiti manyāmahe tathāgatasyāntikāt eṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā|
461:187: tata evaṃ jānīma-etadevāsmākaṃ bahukaraṃ yadvayaṃ tathāgatasyāntikāddivasamudrāmiva nirvāṇaṃ pratilabhāmahe|
461:188: te vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanamārabhya udārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurmaḥ|
461:193: tacca vayaṃ na jānīmo na budhyāmahe yadidaṃ bhagavatā etarhi kathitam-yathā vayaṃ bhagavato bhūtāḥ putrāḥ,
461:196: yathāpi nāma vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti,
461:200: vayaṃ punarbhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ-bodhisattvānāṃ cāgrato hīnādhimuktikā ityuktāḥ,
461:203: anena vayaṃ bhagavan paryāyeṇaivaṃ vadāmaḥ-sahasaivāsmābhirniḥspṛhairākāṅkṣitamamārgitamaparyeṣitamacintitamaprārthitaṃ sarvajñatāratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ yathāpīdaṃ tathāgatasya putraiḥ||
461:204: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahākāśyapastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat—
461:216: anyaṃ ca deśaṃ vraji so sudūram||3||
461:217: pitā ca taṃ śocati tasmi kāle
461:245: so cāpi bālo tada tasya putro
461:253: so ca vrajettaṃ nagaraṃ yahiṃ pitā
461:265: so cā daridro tahi etu dṛṣṭvā
461:273: so cā dhanī taṃ svaku putra dṛṣṭvā
461:281: dṛṣṭvā ca so paṇḍitu taṃ mahādhanī
461:284: pitā mamāyaṃ ti na cāpi śraddadhīt||20||
461:297: so cā dhanī taṃ puruṣaṃ nirīkṣed
461:309: evaṃ ca taṃ bhartsiya tasmi kāle
461:376: evaṃ tu cintetva na bhoti śraddhā||43||
461:388: spṛha tatra asmāka na jātu bhoti||46||
